attributes.action: Discuss the ending of parliamentry privilege
attributes.additional_details: If someone makes a false statement agaianst a person or company within Parliament that person or company has no right of challenge.  In other words, lies might be told which misleads Parliament.  In civil law a decisin can be challenged but not a Parliamentry decision. North Korea we are not, but it is getting that way.
attributes.background: To discuss the ending of parliamentry privilege to allow a more open government.

rejection.details: Not clear if you want parliamentary privilege to be reviewed or repealed. We could accept a petition requesting one of these.
